<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Esercizio di abbinamento sui paesi che sperano di entrare a far parte dell'UE  nel prossimo futuro.</string>
            <string language="en">Matching Task on countries looking forward to joining the EU in the near future</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenpassende Aufgabe auf den Ländern, die 
das, EU in naher Zukunft zu verbinden freuen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparier Chargent sur des pays attendant 
avec intérêt  de joindre l'EU dans un proche avenir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tarefa combinando nos países que olham para a 
frente a juntar o EU no futuro próximo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάζοντας με στοιχειώδης εργασία στις χώρες που 
ανυπομονούν να προσχωρήσει στην ΕΕ στο εγγύς μέλλον</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarea que corresponde con en los países que miran
adelante a ensamblar el EU en el futuro cercano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Alcuni paesi sperano di entrare a far parte dell'UE  nel prossimo futuro. Sai a quali di questi paesi appartengono queste bandiere nazionali?</string>
            <string language="en">Countries looking forward to joining the European Union in the near future.
Do you know which countries these national flags belong to?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">bandiera</string>
            <string language="en">flag</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Länder, die, den europäischen Anschluß im
nahen future.Do zu verbinden freuen wissen Sie, welchen Ländern diese
nationalen Markierungsfahnen gehören?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des pays attendant avec intérêt  de joindre 
l'union européenne dans le future.Do proche vous connaissez à quels 
pays ces indicateurs nationaux appartiennent ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os países que olham para a frente a juntar a 
união européia no future.Do próximo você sabe que países estas 
bandeiras nacionais pertencem?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι χώρες που ανυπομονούν να προσχωρήσουν στην 
Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση στο εγγύς μέλλον εσείς ξέρουν ποιες χώρες 
αυτές οι εθνικές σημαίες ανήκουν;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Los países que miran adelante a ensamblar la 
unión europea en el future.Do cercano usted sabe qué países 
pertenecen estos indicadores nacionales?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indicateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bandeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημαία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">indicador</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
